title: UNO Online
description:
An online multiplayer version of the classic UNO card game.

UNO Online was built as a project to learn about websockets and advanced react applications as well as stretching my skills in UI development with full custom styling.
The project took just over 2 months to get to its current state. I have plans to add further features and polish in the future.

title: mediasync
description:
Mediasync is an extension that allows people to watch online video content together. Playback is synchronised between any number of devices, anywhere in the world. 

Made in collaboration with Zac Cleveland.

title: Automated Farm Monitoring
description:
Automation of certain tasks within the agriculture industry to optimize farming techniques. The project utilised a stationary camera on a paddock in Whitford, NZ. Photos were processed by our trained learning models to output statistics on the quantity of sheep visible, and dry matter (edible grass) quality.
Statistics and alerts were averaged throughout the day and sent to the farmer via email.

Made in collaboration with Kauricone & Team Sheep (AUT).
